p: Owing to the infectivity of 2019 novel coronavirus (2019-nCoV), ECMO poses a high risk when it is performed for COVID-19 patients, which might produce various body fluid splashes, including airway secretions, blood, and others. Therefore, standardized protocols and protective measures should be re-evaluated for implementation and management of ECMO for COVID-19 patients.
